Hi all,
I need to perform a search using an input text field, on 2 richtext columns of a HubDB table; I have tried everything but I can't get results on both columns. The search query is this:
{% set query = query ~ "&question__icontains="~request.query_dict.search|urlencode ~ "&answer__icontains="~request.query_dict.search|urlencode %}
where "request.query_dict.search|urlencode" is the input field where the user types in the text to be searched for
Thanks
Hello,  how can I create a backup of my blog? I am planning to transfer the blog from the current template to a new one

Hi all!

We plan to create a form on a landing page. When a user submits that form we want HubSpot to connect to our server possible synchronously. Our server would return some data that we wish to render to the user on the spot. Or maybe to redirect the user to a generated url.
Any hints what tools of HubSpot we could use to achieve the above? Or any docs that could help?
Anyone else seeing the new taller header navigation in the HubSpot admin? It would be nice if this was not so tall and less search input focused.

Hi Guys, i have some error while app submission, can anyone respond the below question.
     Our app must have three active installs in the other HubSpot account sources before we can submit it. In order to install in the test account, we first created a test account. However, when we tried to log in using the install url in the create app, the page took a long time to load and returned a 504 gateway error. Please offer your ideas so we can resolve this problem.

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!

Yeah, I’ve got it on a few properties — I’m also not huge on it for similar reasons. For power users, it de-emphasizes more specific and direct navigation options that we’d typically gravitate towards.

I imagine the search-forward interface is probably more useful to less savvy users who might not be as familiar with where specific functionality and information can be found. It’s a bit of a band-aid for the somewhat scattered meta-architecture of the HS ecosystem. For example, I’ve had clients who never found the Knowledge Base, Community Forums, HS Academy, etc.
Great perspective on possible reasons for the change. Glad I am not the only one who thinks it's odd but then again change is hard. Who moved my cheese?
As a person who changes how websites look for a living, I always try my best to be generous when I’m annoyed about UI updates. :sweat_smile:

Hey, i made contact with the HubSpot support because i'm getting some error to fetch data from our posts. When i put the endpoint on Insmonia, i'm receiving the data correctly, but when i use the same endpoint, passing the same bearer token, i'm getting an error called {correlationId:09cfefde-aa2d-410c-a80b-a9f08105610a,errorType:MISSING_AUTH,message:Not engaged, auth is missing,status:error}, can someone help me?
I'm a Brazilian developer, if i wrote something wrong please apologize

Hey Team! a beginner question: we are trying to integrate HubSpot with data connector and need the following info: ClientId, ClientSecret, RefreshToken. HAPIkey. so far after creating an app we only got the tocken . could someone give directions here?
